_header: O man more than mad what is thy mind
_description: A warning against deceitful women — eight stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawC813.First Lines: O man more than madde what ys þi mynde…
BodRawC813.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “Liedersammlungen des xvi. Jahrhunderts…IV.” 
             Anglia
         31 (1908): 309-96: 393-5.
